exercises.name: Side Bend
exercises.instruction: Stand upright holding one dubbell to one side,bend over to that side.Bend through the opposite side moving through midsection.

exercises.name: Crunch
exercises.instruction: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat,place your hands to the sides of your head.Lift your head and shoulders off the floor,keeping your feet flat.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Raise
exercises.instruction: Lie on your back with legs straight and hands by your sides.Raise your legs straight up,lifting your lower back off the floor.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.instruction: Start in a sit up position with your feet up off the floor and knees bent with a medicine ball at chest level.Twist your torso to one side ,lowering the medicine ball towards the ground.Twist your torso back to the other side

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instruction: Lie face down on a mat with your legs striaght and arms tucked by your sides with elbows bent.

exercises.name: Bent Over Row
exercises.instruction: Bend forward at your waist with your knees slightly bent and your back flat holding a barbell .Lift the barbell up to your chest bending at your elbows.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instruction: Sit upright holding the handles using a wide grip with your arms extended straight overhead with palms facing forward.Pull your hands down to your shoulders,bending at the elbows

exercises.name: Seated Close Row
exercises.instruction: Sit upright holding the handle with your arms straight out in front and your back flat.Pull the handle straight in your chest,bending at the elbows and squeezing your shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: T-Bar Machine
exercises.instruction: Squat holding one end of a weighted bar between your feet and arms straight and back flat.Pull the bar to your chest,bending at the elbows

exercises.name: Pull Up
exercises.instruction: Hang from a bar overhead usingwith your hands shoulder width apart.Pull your body up bending at the elbows until your chin reaches over the bar.

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.instruction: Stand upright with a barbell on the back of your shoulders .Lower your body towards the floor sending your hips back and down bending your knees.Push through your heels to return to the start position

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instruction: Stand upright with your arms by your side.Take a step forward dropping your back knee to the floor and leaning your torso slightly forward.Push of your front foot to return to the starting position

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instruction: Sit on the leg press machine with your feet shoulder width apart.Unlock the carriage and lower the platform down,bending at your hips and knees.

exercises.name: Step Ups
exercises.instruction: Stand upright with one foot on bench,holding the dumbbells by your side with your arms straight.Step up onto the bench,pushing down your front foot.

exercises.name: Hamstrings
exercises.instruction: Sit upright with both legs and arms straight out in fornt.Reach forward,lowering your hands towards your toes,keeping your legs straight.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.instruction: Hold barbell or dumbbell underhanded with your hands shoulder width apart and your arms straight.Raise the barbell upto the shoulder height,keeping your elbows at the side

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.instruction: Stand upright holding dumbbells with your arms straight by your sides,palms facing inward.Raise the dumbbells up to shoulder height,bending at the elbows.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instruction: Sit holding the handles underhanded with your arms straight and your elbows resting on the support pad.Raise the handles up to the shoulder height,bending at elbows.

exercises.name: Extension
exercises.instruction: Sit on the bench holding one dumbbell in both hands overhead with your arms straight.Lower the dumbbell down behind your head,bending at the elbows.Raise the dumbbell back up overhead ,extending your arms

exercises.name: Cable Pushdown
exercises.instruction: Grip the rope/handle in both handles at chest level with your elbows bent.Push the handles down,fully extending your arms and keeping your shoulders steady.

exercises.name: Bench Dips
exercises.instruction: Place your palms on a bench behind you and your heels on the floor and your legs and arms straight.Lower your body towards the floor,bending at your elbows.Push to your palms to return to start position.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instruction: Stand upright holding a barbell in front at shoulder height with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.Press the barbell overhead,extending arms fully.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instruction: Stand upright holding a barbell in front at shoulder height with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.Press the barbell overhead,extending arms fully.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.instruction: Stand upright holding dumbbells at your sides with arms straight.Raise the dumbbells up and outward to the sides to shoulder height.

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.instruction: Stand upright holding dumbbells/barbell with an overhead grip in front on your thighs with your arms straight.Raise the barbell in front to shoulder height,keeping your arms straight.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.instruction: Lie on the bench holding the barbell up over chest with your arms straight and hands shoulder width apart.Lower the barbell down to upper chest level bending at the elbows.Press the barbell back up to a straight arm position.

exercises.name: Flat Fly
exercises.instruction: Lie on your back with dumbbels up over your chest with arms straight.Lower the dumbbells out and away from your body and down to shoulder level.Raise the dumbbells back up over your chest,keeping your arms straight.

exercises.name: Push Up
exercises.instruction: Support your body on your toes and hands with your elbows bent and your chest nearly touching your floor.Push up to a straight arm position.

exercises.name: Decline Bench Press
exercises.instruction: Lie on a decline bench holding dumbbells at your shoulder level with your elbows bent.Press the dumbbells up over your chest until your arms are straight.

exercises.name: Push Up to T
exercises.instruction: Support your body on your toes and hands with your elbows bent and your chesst nearly touching the floor.Push up to a straight arm position,then raise one hand to the ceiling while rotating your body to the same side and look up to your hand.

plans.notes: Take 3 min breaks between each exercise.
